message.content:
I need to identify the line item that represents the systematic allocation of the depreciable amount of an asset over its useful life, which is depreciation.

Looking at the income statement provided, I can see there is a line item explicitly labeled "Depreciation" with a value of 105893.32 on 2024-02-05.

Depreciation is the accounting method used to allocate the cost of tangible assets over their useful lives, which matches the description in the task.

```json
{"solution": {'value': '105893.32'}}
```
